Description of incident: An unauthorized third party accessed their systems compromising payment card information of certain customers in possibly two of their locations, New York and San Francisco. The breached occured from approximately August 11, 2013 to October 2, 2013. Based on their investigation, the information accessed by the unauthorized party may have included names, payment card numbers, security codes and expiration dates. They are claiming that not all of these data elements were accessed for each customer.
